entity.name: product
entity.query: select id,categoryId,name,onLineTimeLong,description,brandId,tagType from product where online = 1 and isDelete = 0 order by updateTime desc
entity.deltaImportQuery: select id,categoryId,name,onLineTimeLong,description,brandId,tagType from product where online = 1 and isDelete = 0 and id='${dataimporter.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from product where online = 1 and isDelete = 0 and updateTime > '${dataimporter.last_index_time}'

entity.name: productSell
entity.query: select sum(number) from SkuTradeResult where productId= '${product.id}'

entity.name: activityType
entity.query: select activityType from ProductActivity where isDelete = 0 and activityType='LimitTime' and productId='${product.id}' and now() >= startDate and now() <= endDate

entity.name: categoryName
entity.query: select REPLACE(name,'å­','') name from productcategory where id= '${product.leafId}' and isDelete = 0

entity.name: brandName
entity.query: select name from brand where id= '${product.brandId}'
